title: Dixie's Tupperware Party Is Definitely Not Your Grandmother's Tupperware Party
teaser: A Tupperware party in Fort Worth, Texas, drew quite a crowd the other day: 250 people. This wasn't your average Tupperware party â€” it was part improv, part satire and part drag show.
